text: Serbia national volleyball team is the name of Serbia's national volleyball team. The Fédération Internationale de Volleyball considers Serbia the inheritor of the records of SFR Yugoslavia (1948–1991), FR Yugoslavia (1992–2002) and Serbia and Montenegro (2003–2006). Nikola Grbic, a former player and team captain, is the head coach. == Honors == * Olympics: Gold medal (2000) - Bronze medal (1996) * World Championship: Silver Medal (1998) - Bronze medal (2010) * World Cup: Bronze medal (2013) * European Championship: Gold medal (2001, 2011) - Silver medal (1997) - Bronze medal (1975, 1979, 1995, 1999, 2005, 2007, 2013) * World League: Silver medal (2003, 2005, 2008, 2009) - Bronze medal (2002, 2004, 2010) == References == == Other websites == * 2011 European Men's Volleyball Championship (Final) - Italy vs Serbia (1-3) Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sport in Serbia Category:Organizations based in Serbia
title: Serbia men's national volleyball team
